oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Creating Sustainable Science
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: W. Bank
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Background note for the development of an AIS Investment Sourcebook that provides a menu of tools and guidance to invest in agricultural innovation in different contexts. The content is drawn on tested good practice examples and innovative approaches with emphasis on lessons learned, benefits and impacts, implementation issues, and replicability
